params.sqlcmd: "select " +" TO_CHAR(T_INV_CTRL.\\"INV_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"INV_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_INV_CTRL.\\"REGULAR_INV_FLG\\", 'fm0') as \\"REGULAR_INV_FLG\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_INV_CTRL.\\"CYCLE_INV_FLG\\", 'fm0') as \\"CYCLE_INV_FLG\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_INV_CTRL.\\"TEMP_INV_FLG\\", 'fm0') as \\"TEMP_INV_FLG\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_INV_CTRL.\\"INV_STS_TYP\\", 'fm90') as \\"INV_STS_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_INV_CTRL.\\"INV_START_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"INV_START_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_INV_CTRL.\\"STOCK_SAVE_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') as \\"STOCK_SAVE_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_INV_CTRL.\\"INV_UPDATED_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') as \\"INV_UPDATED_DATE\\", " +" T_INV_CTRL.\\"INV_COMMENT\\" as \\"INV_COMMENT\\", " +" T_INV_CTRL.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_INV_CTRL " +"where " +" T_INV_CTRL.\\"INV_DATE\\" = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and T_INV_CTRL.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" M_WH.\\"WH_CD\\" as \\"WH_CD\\", " +" M_WH.\\"WH_NAME\\" as \\"WH_NAME\\", " +" M_WH.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\" " +"from " +" M_WH " +"where " +" M_WH.\\"WH_CD\\" = ?"
"insert into " +" T_ITEM_INV(\\"INV_DATE\\", \\"ITEM_CD\\", \\"WH_CD\\", \\"PLANT_CD\\", \\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\") " +"values " +" (TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), ?, ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?))"

"select " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_ITEM_INV.\\"FINAL_BOOK_STOCK_QTY\\", 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"FINAL_BOOK_STOCK_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_ITEM_INV.\\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\", 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", 'fm90') as \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" T_ITEM_INV.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_ITEM_INV, " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" T_ITEM_INV.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" " +" and T_ITEM_INV.\\"INV_DATE\\" = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and T_ITEM_INV.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_INV.\\"ITEM_CD\\" like ? " +" and T_ITEM_INV.\\"WH_CD\\" = ? " +"order by " +" T_ITEM_INV.\\"WH_CD\\", " +" T_ITEM_INV.\\"ITEM_CD\\""

"update " +" T_ITEM_INV " +"set " +" \\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\" = TO_NUMBER(?) " +"where " +" T_ITEM_INV.\\"INV_DATE\\" = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and T_ITEM_INV.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_INV.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_INV.\\"WH_CD\\" = ?"

"insert into " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV(\\"INV_DATE\\", \\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", \\"ITEM_CD\\", \\"WH_CD\\", \\"PLANT_CD\\", \\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\") " +"values " +" (TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?))"

"select " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV.\\"FINAL_BOOK_STOCK_QTY\\", 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"FINAL_BOOK_STOCK_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV.\\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\", 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", 'fm90') as \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV, " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV.\\"INV_DATE\\" = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV.\\"ITEM_CD\\" like ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV.\\"WH_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" like ? " +"order by " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV.\\"WH_CD\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV.\\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\""

"update " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV " +"set " +" \\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\" = TO_NUMBER(?) " +"where " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV.\\"INV_DATE\\" = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV.\\"WH_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" T_ITEM_INV.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_ITEM_INV " +"where " +" T_ITEM_INV.\\"INV_DATE\\" = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and T_ITEM_INV.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_INV.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_INV.\\"WH_CD\\" = ? " +"for update nowait"

"select " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV " +"where " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV.\\"INV_DATE\\" = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV.\\"WH_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +"for update nowait"

"select " +" TO_CHAR(T_INV_CTRL.\\"INV_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"INV_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_INV_CTRL.\\"REGULAR_INV_FLG\\", 'fm0') as \\"REGULAR_INV_FLG\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_INV_CTRL.\\"CYCLE_INV_FLG\\", 'fm0') as \\"CYCLE_INV_FLG\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_INV_CTRL.\\"TEMP_INV_FLG\\", 'fm0') as \\"TEMP_INV_FLG\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_INV_CTRL.\\"INV_STS_TYP\\", 'fm90') as \\"INV_STS_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_INV_CTRL.\\"INV_START_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"INV_START_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_INV_CTRL.\\"STOCK_SAVE_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') as \\"STOCK_SAVE_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_INV_CTRL.\\"INV_UPDATED_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') as \\"INV_UPDATED_DATE\\", " +" T_INV_CTRL.\\"INV_COMMENT\\" as \\"INV_COMMENT\\", " +" T_INV_CTRL.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_INV_CTRL " +"where " +" T_INV_CTRL.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_INV_CTRL.\\"INV_STS_TYP\\" = 1 " +"order by " +" T_INV_CTRL.\\"INV_DATE\\""

"select " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", 'fm90') as \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", 'fm90') as \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ABC_TYP\\" as \\"ABC_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"LOT_CTRL_FLG\\" as \\"LOT_CTRL_FLG\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"LOT_NUMBERING_TYP\\" as \\"LOT_NUMBERING_TYP\\" " +"from " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" T_OD.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_OD " +"where " +" T_OD.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_OD.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" T_INV_CYCLE.\\"INV_FLG_JAN\\" as \\"INV_FLG_JAN\\", " +" T_INV_CYCLE.\\"INV_FLG_FEB\\" as \\"INV_FLG_FEB\\", " +" T_INV_CYCLE.\\"INV_FLG_MAR\\" as \\"INV_FLG_MAR\\", " +" T_INV_CYCLE.\\"INV_FLG_APR\\" as \\"INV_FLG_APR\\", " +" T_INV_CYCLE.\\"INV_FLG_MAY\\" as \\"INV_FLG_MAY\\", " +" T_INV_CYCLE.\\"INV_FLG_JUN\\" as \\"INV_FLG_JUN\\", " +" T_INV_CYCLE.\\"INV_FLG_JUL\\" as \\"INV_FLG_JUL\\", " +" T_INV_CYCLE.\\"INV_FLG_AUG\\" as \\"INV_FLG_AUG\\", " +" T_INV_CYCLE.\\"INV_FLG_SEP\\" as \\"INV_FLG_SEP\\", " +" T_INV_CYCLE.\\"INV_FLG_OCT\\" as \\"INV_FLG_OCT\\", " +" T_INV_CYCLE.\\"INV_FLG_NOV\\" as \\"INV_FLG_NOV\\", " +" T_INV_CYCLE.\\"INV_FLG_DEC\\" as \\"INV_FLG_DEC\\" " +"from " +" T_INV_CYCLE " +"where " +" T_INV_CYCLE.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_INV_CYCLE.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" T_INV_TARGET_ITEM.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_INV_TARGET_ITEM " +"where " +" T_INV_TARGET_ITEM.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_INV_TARGET_ITEM.\\"INV_DATE\\" = ? " +" and T_INV_TARGET_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" T_INV_TARGET_WH.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_INV_TARGET_WH " +"where " +" T_INV_TARGET_WH.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_INV_TARGET_WH.\\"INV_DATE\\" = ? " +" and T_INV_TARGET_WH.\\"WH_CD\\" = ?"
"SELECT " +" VALUE " +"FROM " +" SYS_PARAMETER " +"WHERE " +" NAME = 'PAST_RESULT_ENTRY_TYP'"
"SELECT " +" PROC_EXEC_DATE " +"FROM " +" SYS_ACTUAL_COST_CTRL_AC " +"WHERE " +" PLANT_CD = ?"

"select " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" T_LOT_INV.\\"WH_CD\\" as \\"WH_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_LOT_INV.\\"FINAL_BOOK_STOCK_QTY\\", 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"FINAL_BOOK_STOCK_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_LOT_INV.\\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\", 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", 'fm90') as \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" T_LOT_INV.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" T_LOT_INV.LOT_NO AS LOT_NO " +"from " +" T_LOT_INV, " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" T_LOT_INV.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD " +" and M_ITEM.LOT_CTRL_FLG = 1 " +" and T_LOT_INV.INV_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and T_LOT_INV.PLANT_CD = ? " +" and T_LOT_INV.ITEM_CD like ? " +" and T_LOT_INV.WH_CD = ? " +" and T_LOT_INV.LOT_NO like ?"

"select " +" * " +"from " +" ( " +" select " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" T_LOT_INV.\\"WH_CD\\" as \\"WH_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_LOT_INV.\\"FINAL_BOOK_STOCK_QTY\\", 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"FINAL_BOOK_STOCK_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_LOT_INV.\\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\", 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", 'fm90') as \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" T_LOT_INV.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" T_LOT_INV.LOT_NO AS LOT_NO, " +" T_ITEM_INV.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT_1\\", " +" T_LOT_INV.LOT_NO AS LOT_ROW_NO " +" from " +" T_LOT_INV, " +" T_ITEM_INV, " +" M_ITEM " +" where " +" T_LOT_INV.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD " +" and M_ITEM.LOT_CTRL_FLG = 1 " +" and T_LOT_INV.INV_DATE = T_ITEM_INV.INV_DATE " +" and T_LOT_INV.ITEM_CD = T_ITEM_INV.ITEM_CD " +" and T_LOT_INV.WH_CD = T_ITEM_INV.WH_CD " +" and T_LOT_INV.INV_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and T_LOT_INV.PLANT_CD = ? " +" and T_LOT_INV.ITEM_CD like ? " +" and T_LOT_INV.WH_CD = ? " +" union " +" select " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" T_ITEM_INV.\\"WH_CD\\" as \\"WH_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_ITEM_INV.\\"FINAL_BOOK_STOCK_QTY\\", 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"FINAL_BOOK_STOCK_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_ITEM_INV.\\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\", 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", 'fm90') as \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" T_ITEM_INV.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" null as LOT_NO, " +" T_ITEM_INV.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT_1\\", " +" ' ' AS LOT_ROW_NO " +" from " +" T_ITEM_INV, " +" M_ITEM " +" where " +" T_ITEM_INV.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" " +" and T_ITEM_INV.\\"INV_DATE\\" = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and T_ITEM_INV.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_INV.\\"ITEM_CD\\" like ? " +" and T_ITEM_INV.\\"WH_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_ITEM.LOT_CTRL_FLG = 0 " +" union " +" select " +" * " +" from " +" ( " +" select " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" T_ITEM_INV.\\"WH_CD\\" as \\"WH_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR((T_ITEM_INV.\\"FINAL_BOOK_STOCK_QTY\\" - A.\\"FINAL_BOOK_STOCK_QTY\\"), 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"FINAL_BOOK_STOCK_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR((T_ITEM_INV.\\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\" - A.\\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\"), 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", 'fm90') as \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" T_ITEM_INV.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" null as LOT_NO, " +" T_ITEM_INV.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT_1\\", " +" ' ' AS LOT_ROW_NO " +" from " +" T_ITEM_INV, " +" M_ITEM, " +" ( " +" select " +" sum(T_LOT_INV.\\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\") as \\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\", " +" sum(T_LOT_INV.\\"FINAL_BOOK_STOCK_QTY\\") as \\"FINAL_BOOK_STOCK_QTY\\", " +" T_LOT_INV.ITEM_CD as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" T_LOT_INV.WH_CD as \\"WH_CD\\", " +" T_LOT_INV.PLANT_CD as \\"PLANT_CD\\" " +" from " +" T_LOT_INV " +" where " +" T_LOT_INV.INV_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and T_LOT_INV.PLANT_CD = ? " +" and T_LOT_INV.WH_CD = ? " +" and T_LOT_INV.ITEM_CD like ? " +" group by " +" T_LOT_INV.ITEM_CD, " +" T_LOT_INV.WH_CD, " +" T_LOT_INV.PLANT_CD " +" ) A " +" where " +" T_ITEM_INV.INV_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and M_ITEM.LOT_CTRL_FLG = 1 " +" and M_ITEM.ITEM_CD = A.ITEM_CD " +" and T_ITEM_INV.PLANT_CD = A.PLANT_CD " +" and T_ITEM_INV.WH_CD = A.WH_CD " +" and T_ITEM_INV.ITEM_CD = A.ITEM_CD " +" ) B " +" where " +" B.ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY != 0 " +" ) A " +"order by " +" A.ITEM_CD, " +" A.WH_CD, " +" A.LOT_ROW_NO"

"select " +" T_LOT_INV.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" T_ITEM_INV.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT_1\\" " +"from " +" T_LOT_INV, " +" T_ITEM_INV " +"where " +" T_LOT_INV.\\"INV_DATE\\" = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and T_LOT_INV.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_LOT_INV.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_LOT_INV.\\"WH_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_LOT_INV.\\"LOT_NO\\" = ? " +" and T_LOT_INV.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = T_ITEM_INV.ITEM_CD " +" and T_LOT_INV.\\"WH_CD\\" = T_ITEM_INV.WH_CD " +" and T_LOT_INV.\\"INV_DATE\\" = T_ITEM_INV.INV_DATE"

"select " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" T_ITEM_INV.\\"WH_CD\\" as \\"WH_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_ITEM_INV.\\"FINAL_BOOK_STOCK_QTY\\", 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"FINAL_BOOK_STOCK_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR((T_ITEM_INV.\\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\" - A.\\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\"), 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", 'fm90') as \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" T_ITEM_INV.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" decode(T_ITEM_INV.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", null, null) as LOT_NO, " +" TO_CHAR(T_ITEM_INV.\\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\", 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY_1\\" " +"from " +" T_ITEM_INV, " +" M_ITEM, " +" ( " +" select " +" TO_CHAR(sum(T_LOT_INV.\\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\"), 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\", " +" T_LOT_INV.ITEM_CD as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" T_LOT_INV.WH_CD as \\"WH_CD\\", " +" T_LOT_INV.PLANT_CD as \\"PLANT_CD\\" " +" from " +" T_LOT_INV " +" where " +" T_LOT_INV.INV_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and T_LOT_INV.PLANT_CD = ? " +" and T_LOT_INV.ITEM_CD = ? " +" and T_LOT_INV.WH_CD = ? " +" group by " +" T_LOT_INV.ITEM_CD, " +" T_LOT_INV.WH_CD, " +" T_LOT_INV.PLANT_CD " +" ) A " +"where " +" T_ITEM_INV.INV_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and M_ITEM.ITEM_CD = A.ITEM_CD " +" and T_ITEM_INV.PLANT_CD = A.PLANT_CD " +" and T_ITEM_INV.WH_CD = A.WH_CD " +" and T_ITEM_INV.ITEM_CD = A.ITEM_CD"

"update " +" T_LOT_INV " +"set " +" \\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\" = TO_NUMBER(?) " +"where " +" T_LOT_INV.\\"INV_DATE\\" = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and T_LOT_INV.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_LOT_INV.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_LOT_INV.\\"WH_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_LOT_INV.\\"LOT_NO\\" = ?"

"select " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" T_LOT_INV.\\"WH_CD\\" as \\"WH_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_LOT_INV.\\"FINAL_BOOK_STOCK_QTY\\", 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"FINAL_BOOK_STOCK_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_LOT_INV.\\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\", 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", 'fm90') as \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" T_LOT_INV.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" T_LOT_INV.LOT_NO AS LOT_NO " +"from " +" T_LOT_INV, " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" T_LOT_INV.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD " +" and M_ITEM.LOT_CTRL_FLG = 1 " +" and T_LOT_INV.INV_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and T_LOT_INV.PLANT_CD = ? " +" and T_LOT_INV.ITEM_CD = ? " +" and T_LOT_INV.WH_CD = ? " +" and T_LOT_INV.LOT_NO = ?"

"select " +" T_LOT_CTRL.LOT_NO, " +" to_char(T_LOT_CTRL.BEST_BEFORE_DATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd') as BEST_BEFORE_DATE, " +" T_LOT_CTRL.DEL_FLG, " +" to_char(T_LOT_CTRL.PRD_CMPLT_DATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd') as PRD_CMPLT_DATE " +"from " +" T_LOT_CTRL " +"where " +" T_LOT_CTRL.ITEM_CD = ? " +" and T_LOT_CTRL.LOT_NO = ?"
"Select " +" to_char(BUSINESS_OPR_DATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd') as BUSINESS_OPR_DATE " +"from " +" SYS_DATE_CTRL " +"where " +" SYS_DATE_CTRL.PLANT_CD = ?"
"INSERT INTO " +" T_LOT_CTRL(LOT_NO, ITEM_CD, PRD_CMPLT_DATE, BEST_BEFORE_DATE, DEL_FLG) " +"VALUES " +" (?, ?, ?, ?, 0)"
"select " +" T_LOT_CTRL.LOT_NO " +"from " +" T_LOT_CTRL " +"where " +" T_LOT_CTRL.LOT_NO = ?"
"update " +" T_LOT_CTRL " +"set " +" PRD_CMPLT_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), " +" BEST_BEFORE_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), " +" DEL_FLG = 0 " +"where " +" LOT_NO = ? " +" and ITEM_CD = ?"
"update " +" T_LOT_CTRL " +"set " +" DEL_FLG = 0 " +"where " +" LOT_NO = ? " +" and ITEM_CD = ?"
"insert into " +" T_LOT_INV(\\"INV_DATE\\", \\"ITEM_CD\\", \\"WH_CD\\", \\"LOT_NO\\", \\"PLANT_CD\\", \\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\") " +"values " +" (TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?))"

"select " +" TO_CHAR(sum(T_LOT_INV.\\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\"), 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\", " +" T_LOT_INV.ITEM_CD " +"from " +" T_LOT_INV " +"where " +" T_LOT_INV.INV_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and T_LOT_INV.PLANT_CD = ? " +" and T_LOT_INV.WH_CD = ? " +" and T_LOT_INV.ITEM_CD = ? " +"group by " +" T_LOT_INV.ITEM_CD"
"SELECT " +" T_INV_CTRL.APPR_FLG " +"FROM " +" T_INV_CTRL " +"WHERE " +" T_INV_CTRL.PLANT_CD = ? " +" AND T_INV_CTRL.INV_DATE = ?"

"select " +" count(1) " +"from " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV, " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV.\\"INV_DATE\\" = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV.\\"ITEM_CD\\" like ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV.\\"WH_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_INV.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" like ? " +" and ROWNUM <= TO_NUMBER(?) + 1"

"select " +" count(1) " +"from " +" T_LOT_INV, " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" T_LOT_INV.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD " +" and M_ITEM.LOT_CTRL_FLG = 1 " +" and T_LOT_INV.INV_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and T_LOT_INV.PLANT_CD = ? " +" and T_LOT_INV.ITEM_CD like ? " +" and T_LOT_INV.WH_CD = ? " +" and T_LOT_INV.LOT_NO like ? " +" and ROWNUM <= TO_NUMBER(?) + 1"

"select " +" count(1) " +"from " +" ( " +" select " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" T_LOT_INV.\\"WH_CD\\" as \\"WH_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_LOT_INV.\\"FINAL_BOOK_STOCK_QTY\\", 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"FINAL_BOOK_STOCK_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_LOT_INV.\\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\", 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", 'fm90') as \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" T_LOT_INV.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" T_LOT_INV.LOT_NO AS LOT_NO, " +" T_ITEM_INV.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT_1\\", " +" T_LOT_INV.LOT_NO AS LOT_ROW_NO " +" from " +" T_LOT_INV, " +" T_ITEM_INV, " +" M_ITEM " +" where " +" T_LOT_INV.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD " +" and M_ITEM.LOT_CTRL_FLG = 1 " +" and T_LOT_INV.INV_DATE = T_ITEM_INV.INV_DATE " +" and T_LOT_INV.ITEM_CD = T_ITEM_INV.ITEM_CD " +" and T_LOT_INV.WH_CD = T_ITEM_INV.WH_CD " +" and T_LOT_INV.INV_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and T_LOT_INV.PLANT_CD = ? " +" and T_LOT_INV.ITEM_CD like ? " +" and T_LOT_INV.WH_CD = ? " +" union " +" select " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" T_ITEM_INV.\\"WH_CD\\" as \\"WH_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_ITEM_INV.\\"FINAL_BOOK_STOCK_QTY\\", 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"FINAL_BOOK_STOCK_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_ITEM_INV.\\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\", 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", 'fm90') as \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" T_ITEM_INV.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" null as LOT_NO, " +" T_ITEM_INV.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT_1\\", " +" ' ' AS LOT_ROW_NO " +" from " +" T_ITEM_INV, " +" M_ITEM " +" where " +" T_ITEM_INV.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" " +" and T_ITEM_INV.\\"INV_DATE\\" = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and T_ITEM_INV.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_INV.\\"ITEM_CD\\" like ? " +" and T_ITEM_INV.\\"WH_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_ITEM.LOT_CTRL_FLG = 0 " +" union " +" select " +" * " +" from " +" ( " +" select " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" T_ITEM_INV.\\"WH_CD\\" as \\"WH_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR((T_ITEM_INV.\\"FINAL_BOOK_STOCK_QTY\\" - A.\\"FINAL_BOOK_STOCK_QTY\\"), 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"FINAL_BOOK_STOCK_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR((T_ITEM_INV.\\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\" - A.\\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\"), 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", 'fm90') as \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" T_ITEM_INV.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" null as LOT_NO, " +" T_ITEM_INV.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT_1\\", " +" ' ' AS LOT_ROW_NO " +" from " +" T_ITEM_INV, " +" M_ITEM, " +" ( " +" select " +" sum(T_LOT_INV.\\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\") as \\"ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY\\", " +" sum(T_LOT_INV.\\"FINAL_BOOK_STOCK_QTY\\") as \\"FINAL_BOOK_STOCK_QTY\\", " +" T_LOT_INV.ITEM_CD as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" T_LOT_INV.WH_CD as \\"WH_CD\\", " +" T_LOT_INV.PLANT_CD as \\"PLANT_CD\\" " +" from " +" T_LOT_INV " +" where " +" T_LOT_INV.INV_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and T_LOT_INV.PLANT_CD = ? " +" and T_LOT_INV.WH_CD = ? " +" and T_LOT_INV.ITEM_CD like ? " +" group by " +" T_LOT_INV.ITEM_CD, " +" T_LOT_INV.WH_CD, " +" T_LOT_INV.PLANT_CD " +" ) A " +" where " +" T_ITEM_INV.INV_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and M_ITEM.LOT_CTRL_FLG = 1 " +" and M_ITEM.ITEM_CD = A.ITEM_CD " +" and T_ITEM_INV.PLANT_CD = A.PLANT_CD " +" and T_ITEM_INV.WH_CD = A.WH_CD " +" and T_ITEM_INV.ITEM_CD = A.ITEM_CD " +" ) B " +" where " +" B.ACTUAL_STOCK_QTY != 0 " +" ) A " +"where " +" ROWNUM <= TO_NUMBER(?) + 1"

cell.name: ERR_MSG
cell.description: ＣＳＶ取込データのエラー内容

cell.name: ERR_ADR
cell.description: ＣＳＶ取込データのエラー箇所

cell.name: h_change_flg
cell.description: 一覧実棚数変更フラグ

cell.name: w_COLUMN_FLG
cell.description: ＣＳＶ取込データの項目数不足エラー判定用
